articles.author: Brady Snyder
articles.title: Samsung's Galaxy S20 series won't get any more monthly updates - Android Central
articles.description: The Galaxy S20 series' four-year run has come to an end.
articles.content:
What you need to know
  • Samsung Galaxy phones released in 2020 received their last monthly update with the March 2024 security patch. 
  • From now on, the Galaxy S20 series will get quart… [+2657 chars]
